code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../css/Appartements.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Appartements=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const apartments=[{name:'RIVES DU LEZ',rating:'⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐',description:'Excellent',price:'730€ / mois',info:'Situé à proximité des rives du Lez, cet appartement est idéal pour les amoureux de la nature.',photos:['url_photo_1','url_photo_2','url_photo_3']},{name:'Barcel Raval',rating:'⭐⭐⭐⭐',description:'Good',price:'730€ / mois',info:'Cet appartement est situé dans le célèbre quartier du Raval à Barcelone.',photos:['url_photo_1','url_photo_2','url_photo_3']}];const handleClick=apartment=>{navigate('/details-appartement',{state:{apartment}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"appartements-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar",children:apartments.map((apartment,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"apartment-card",onClick:()=>handleClick(apartment),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:apartment.photos[0],alt:apartment.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"apartment-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:apartment.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[apartment.rating," - ",apartment.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:["Prix : ",apartment.price]})]})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"map",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"url_de_la_map",alt:"Map"})})]});};export default Appartements;
